H0.text: Which boxing champion had the nickname 'Hit-Man'. Mike Tyson

H1.text: Which boxing champion had the nickname 'Hit-Man'. George Foreman

H2.text: Which boxing champion had the nickname 'Hit-Man'. Rocky Marciano

H3.text: Which boxing champion had the nickname 'Hit-Man'. Tommy Hearns

A4.text: Nicknamed 'Iron Mike' and 'Kid Dynamite' in his early career, and later known as 'the Baddest Man on the Planet'.
